title: Nicki Minaj brings Kenneth Petty to star-studded bash for her Fendi collab
text:
They are on the verge of getting married.

And Nicki Minaj brought her hunky fiance, manslaughter convict Kenneth Petty, to a Beverly Hills party for her Fendi collaboration on Tuesday.

The 36-year-old rapper wore a open-weave net dress that flashed her gleaming metallic underwear as she arrived at the launch event.

On the town: Nicki Minaj brought her hunky fiance, manslaughter convict Kenneth Petty, to a Beverly Hills party for her Fendi collaboration on Tuesday

She matched her crimson hairdo to her hoop earrings and wore a complementary shade of purple lipstick for her big night.

The Anaconda hitmaker snapped selfies on the sidewalk with her man, who wore a silver Fendi jacket with metallic shoes and a sparkling baseball cap.

Tuesday's guest list included Chloe and Halle Bailey, the sister-act who release music under the name Chloe X Halle.

Halle, who modeled a hot pink dress to the launch party, was cast this year as Ariel in Disney's live-action remake of its 1989 classic The Little Mermaid.

When you got it: The 36-year-old rapper wore a open-weave net dress that flashed her gleaming metallic underwear as she arrived at the launch event

Coordinated: She matched her crimson hairdo to her hoop earrings and wore a complementary shade of purple lipstick for her big night

On the move: The Anaconda hitmaker snapped selfies on the sidewalk with her man, who wore a silver Fendi jacket with metallic shoes and a sparkling baseball cap

Family business: Tuesday's guest list included Chloe and Halle Bailey, the sister-act who release music under the name Chloe X Halle

Rising movie star: Halle, who modeled a hot pink dress to the launch party, was cast this year as Ariel in Disney's live-action remake of its 1989 classic The Little Mermaid

Michael Jackson's 21-year-old daughter Paris could also be spotted arriving at the party, modeling large bronze-tinted sunglasses at night.

She hewed to her usual sense of hippie chic by throwing on a camel-toned fringe jacket but also gave a nod to the event with a Fendi top.

Also at the Nicki and Fendi party was music heartthrob Thomas Wesley a.k.a. Diplo, who threw on a colorful print tee for the occasion.

Legacy: Michael Jackson's 21-year-old daughter Paris could also be spotted arriving at the party, modeling large bronze-tinted sunglasses at night

Blend: She hewed to her usual sense of hippie chic by throwing on a camel-toned fringe jacket but also gave a nod to the event with a Fendi top

Smoldering: Also at the Nicki and Fendi party was music heartthrob Thomas Wesley a.k.a. Diplo, who threw on a colorful print tee for the occasion

On her show Queen Radio this August, Nicki shared that she was 'about 80 days' away from finally tying the knot with her sex offender beau.

Nicki said he and Kenneth 'filed for the marriage license and we still had to pick it up and I was traveling, by the time I came back, we had to renew it again.'

She dished: 'From that time, you have 90 days to get married. That was about a week ago, so now I have about 80 days.'

Kenneth spent seven years behind bars for first degree manslaughter, which he pleaded guilty to after being charged with second degree murder, TMZ reported.

Wedding bells: On her show Queen Radio this August, Nicki shared that she was 'about 80 days' away from finally tying the knot with her sex offender beau

Details: Nicki said he and Kenneth 'filed for the marriage license and we still had to pick it up and I was traveling, by the time I came back, we had to renew it again'

Process: She dished: 'From that time, you have 90 days to get married,' adding: 'That was about a week ago, so now I have about 80 days'

Citing insiders in law enforcement, the website claimed that Kenneth shot one Lamont Robinson three times on a street corner in Queens in April 2002.

Kenneth and some associates allegedly drove to a point across the street from Lamont, whereupon Kenneth emerged from the vehicle and walked over to his victim before firing into his stomach.

Lamont identified a photograph of his killer to police before dying in the hospital shortly after being shot, per court documents.

History: Kenneth spent seven years behind bars for first degree manslaughter, which he pleaded guilty to after being charged with second degree murder, TMZ reported

The crime: Citing insiders in law enforcement, the website claimed that Kenneth shot one Lamont Robinson three times on a street corner in Queens in April 2002

An investigator dismissed the reason for the shooting as 'bulls***' to TMZ, whose sources theorized that the violence was gang-related.

Kenneth, 41, earned his sex offender status after being convicted in 1995 of the first degree attempted rape of a 16-year-old girl.

He made use of a 'knife/cutting instrument' during the crime, according to public records from the New York Division Of Criminal Justice Services.
description: Nicki Minaj brought her hunky fiance, manslaughter convict Kenneth Petty, to a Beverly Hills party for her Fendi collaboration on Tuesday.
